live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to resolve this issue.
47353.summary: Some customers in the Brevoort Park area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47353.title: Mar 4 - Saskatoon  (Brevoort Park) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
47392.summary: Some customers in Evanston area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
47392.title: Mar 5 - Calgary  (Evanston) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
